title: Mavs waiting on health as difficult West challenge looms
text: > Texas Mavs waiting on health as difficult West challenge looms FILE - In this April 24, 2015, file photo, Dallas Mavericks' Dirk Nowitzki, of Germany, runs upcourt against the Houston Rockets during Game 3 in an NBA basketball first-round playoff series. Nowitzki and the Mavericks were jilted by DeAndre Jordan in free agency and are noâ€™t sure when all their projected starters will play together for the first time in the difficult Western Conference. (AP Photo/Tony Gutierrez, File)
